thoughts.text: I think I need to check if the file I want to read exists before attempting to read it. I will use the 'list_files' command to do this.
thoughts.reasoning: I received an error when trying to read a file, so I need to check if the file exists before reading it.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'list_files' command to check if the file I want to read exists.
- If the file exists, use the 'read_file' command to read its contents.
- If the file does not exist, I will need to create it using the 'write_to_file' command.
thoughts.criticism: I should have checked if the file existed before trying to read it.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'list_files' command to check if the file I want to read exists.
